entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening then clear. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:32 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
